testcase.name: User should able to get Wire Headphones page
testcase.system-out: Given Go to: "https://www.flipkart.com/"....................................passed When user find Wire Headphones and click it.................................passed Then Verify user on Wire Headphones page....................................passed

testcase.name: User should be able locate t-shirts on the search box
testcase.system-out: Given Go to: "https://www.flipkart.com/"....................................passed When click on the search box................................................passed And choose t-shirts on search list..........................................passed Then Verify user on "T Shirts" page.........................................passed
